title: 13 INSANE Problems With 13 REASONS WHY
author: Think Story
comment: I've never used the word "unethical" more in a video...
Can we talk about how Alex literally MURDERED someone in the previous season and then in this season his main arc is about understanding his sexuality? Like WHAT???
Wasn’t this show about suicide? This sounds like a season of RiverDale.

Zach was an alcoholic in this season, almost every scene he’s in he’s either drunk or drinking. You’d think they’d help him go to rehab or seek help? 🙄 he was kinda ignored and they let him carry on being a mess. Yet their quick to help Justin and everyone else.
for the first point: isn't Clay's mom a whole ass lawyer too??
description:
In this video we take a look at Season 4 of Netflix's 13 Reasons Why and outline a lot of its problems and controversy tackling different issues... among obvious glaring plot holes.
